Text: I had put down the wrong name i do apologize, i am just starting with this stuff and i didn't have my stuff organized but this file is actually the Horse Armor Pack for the X box 360. and it is uploaded simply to see if you guy/girls would like to try and rehash it for yourselfs and get it to work, i myself am having issuse doing that same thing with different dlc so you may try if you wish, and if you succed plz inform me if you would be so kind
